1.name: Player
1.Text: I was able to take advantage of a lot of people to get here.

2.name: Player
2.Text: If it's still reasonable to call them persons... they are totally deprived of em-.

4.name: Player
4.Text: They must have some emotions, otherwise i wuoldn't have been able to control them!

5.name: Player
5.Text: Still I didn't receive any answare...
